channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 20m long pothole causing damage to cars, 17th February
item.description:
On school lane outside swallow cottage. The road is humped in the middle and with long potholes on wheel tracks it is damaging the underside of our cars. We are on our second exhaust in a year.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): School Lane, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven road with potholes throughout, 17th February
item.description:
Most of the road is uneven and bumpy, there’s pot holes big and small along the road and areas where it appears old potholes have been patched poorly. The whole road is not good to drive down, and looks terrible. Resurfacing if the whole road is required
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 48, Keynsham Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Traffic Cone, 17th February
item.description:
Severn Trent have left a broken traffic Cone outside 207 Pirton Lane. Reported to GCC a month ago but they haven't collected.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 207, Pirton Lane, Churchdown, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous pothole , all dangerous., 17th February
item.description:
All along the road are numerous potholes , all dangerous. Why are they not being fixed? It's been like it for months . I won't let my kids cycle down this road it is too dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Whittington Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Looks to be a metal bed frame dumped on the corner of hillview Road and Wilkes avenue - second lot in as many weeks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wilkes Avenue, Hucclecote, Gloucester

item.title: Multiple huge potholes surrounding the double roundabout, 17th February
item.description:
Multiple huge potholes surrounding the double roundabout, makes it very difficult to get across without damaging tyres and tracking. Needs looking at urgently before further damage is caused and a cyclist is injured.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faded disabled parking bays creating safety risk at nursery – Gibson Rd, Innsworth GL3 1ET, 17th February
item.description:
Two designated disabled parking bays at The Old Station Nursery, Gibson Rd, Innsworth (GL3 1ET) have significantly faded markings and are now difficult to identify. As a disabled parent accessing the nursery, I rely on these bays for safe drop-off and collection. Because the markings are unclear, they are frequently used by non-disabled drivers. This often forces me to park further away and carry my child across a busy car park with moving vehicles, creating a genuine safety risk. Please could the disabled bays be repainted with clear high-visibility markings. Also please confirm whether this car park area is adopted highway or privately maintained, and which authority is responsible for maintaining accessible parking provision. This is an accessibility and safety concern affecting access to a childcare setting. I am concerned for the safety of my daughter in a busy car park that u often have to carry her across, which is not acceptable with my disability.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Edges of road have been ruined, 17th February
item.description:
The edges of Kayte lane have been ruined by recent weather and traffic due to diversions. There are large chunks of tarmac broken up and potholes all along the lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked outside Italian restaurant, 17th February

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Church Road, Bishop's Cleeve
